title: Saturday Morning BreakfastSerial: Hacking Arduinos in Python
summary: Normally when you want to hack on arduino, you have to code in C. We as Python devs know that sucks! Introducing BreakfastSerial, a framework that makes it simple to interact with Arduinos using just Python. You'll learn the basics, see some fun demos, and become a hardware-hacking pro in no time.
